pageProduct.name: Olay Regenerist Advanced Anti-Ageing Micro-Sculpting UV Day Face Cream SPF 30 50g
pageProduct.description:
Information

REGENERIST MICRO-SCULPTING CREAM SPF 30

Regenerist is Olay's Advanced Anti-Ageing Collection. The supercharged Regenerist formulas, with key anti-ageing ingredients like amino-peptides, are engineered to regenerate surface skin cells and deliver visible, transformative results for younger-looking skin.

ADVANCED ANTI-AGEING FORMULA

Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream SPF 30 protects from harmful UVA/UVB rays while hydrating to improve elasticity and firm skin for a lifted look. Supercharged with skin-plumping Amino-Peptide Complex, this lightweight SPF moisturiser smoothes and corrects the look of fine lines and wrinkles. It improves skin's texture in 4 weeks.

SCIENCE, INGREDIENTS, SUN PROTECTION & REGIMEN

Science: Olay analysed over 70,000 genomic samples for over 17 years and discovered that about 10% of women naturally look years younger. Inspired by this discovery, Olay re-engineered its products to help take years off your visual skin age, delivering visible, transformative results, so every woman can be ageless.

Ingredients: Engineered with Amino-Peptide Complex and combined with key anti-ageing ingredients, Micro-Sculpting Cream SPF 30 helps correct the look of ageing skin and aids surface cell regeneration. It's lightweight SPF formula helps protect against the #1 cause of ageing skin - damage from the sun - so you can reveal ageless skin.

Sun Protection: SolaSheer Technology combines Broad Spectrum sunscreen with Niacinamide and Glycerin, two of Olay's proven moisturising and anti-ageing agents. The Broad Spectrum sunscreen works to protect skin from UVA and UVB rays while the moisturising agents hydrate to keep the skin looking healthy.

Regimen: Micro-Sculpting Cream SPF 30 moisturiser is the last step in your daily skincare regimen. It protects your skin and immediately leaves skin hydrated, providing long lasting moisturisation. Use Olay Regenerist cleansers, concentrates and treatments before applying moisturiser.

FIND THE RIGHT ADVANCED ANTI-AGEING MOISTURISER

FIND THE RIGHT COLLECTION FOR YOUR SKIN

Luminous formulas, with advanced tone-correcting ingredients like niacinamida and glycerin, are designed to visibly brighten skin and even tone.

Total Effects formulas, with nourishing ingredients like vitamins and antioxidants, give seven benefits in one to help fight signs of ageing for younger-looking skin.

ProX formulas, with ingredients like pro-retinol and amino peptides, offer proven skincare solutions to target root causes of ageing for healthy-looking skin.

The Olay Eyes Collection is specifically formulated for the delicate eye area to fight virtually every eye concern: dark circles, puffy eyes, fine lines and under eye wrinkles.

General Information

Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Face Cream Moisturiser SPF 30 firms, plumps & reduces wrinkles. Firmer, plumper skin in 28 days!

Features:
- Renews skin's youthful look, reduces lines and wrinkles with moisturisation, exfoliates and hydrates skin
- Look up to 10 years younger in just 28 days!
- Broad spectrum SPF 30 that protects against UVA/UVB rays to help prevent skin ageing from sun exposure
- Formula with most concentrated Amino-peptide Complex helps renew skin's surface cells
- Formula with Hydra-Firming Complex helps retain skin's youthful look
- Rich creamy texture that spreads easily and is non-greasy
- No added fragrance
- Visibly reduces wrinkles from day 1



Anti-Ageing Day Cream SPF 30 Protection

Day 1: Visibly reduces pores, improves texture & radiance.
Day 14: Noticeably firmer skin.
Day 28: Visibly reduces wrinkles.


*Always read the label. Follow the directions for use. Avoid prolonged exposure to the sun. Wear protective clothing, hats and eyewear when exposed to the sun. Frequent reapplication is required for effective sun protection 

Product Claims: Look up to 10 years younger in just 4 weeks

Size: 50mL

SPF: 30

KEY FEATURES

• Firmer, plumper skin in 28 days!
• Hydrates to help firm skin.
• Formula with Amino-peptide Complex helps renew skin's surface. Broad spectrum SPF 30 UVA/UVB sunscreen.
• Renews skin's youthful look, reduces lines and wrinkles with moisturisation, exfoliates and hydrates skin
• Broad spectrum SPF 30 that protects against UVA/UVB rays to help prevent skin ageing from sun exposure

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse eyes with water. If skin irritation develops, discontinue use. For external use on unbroken skin only. Keep out of reach of children. Always read the label. Follow the directions for use. Avoid prolonged exposure to the sun. Wear protective clothing, hats and eyewear when exposed to the sun. Frequent reapplication is required for effective sun protection

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane 3.00%w/w, Octyl Methoxycinnamate 7.49% w/w.

Contains: Preservatives: Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate.

Directions

Using your fingertips, smooth evenly onto clean skin over face and neck prior to sun exposure and as often as necessary.

USAGE ADVICE

Choose from among the following regimen steps from Regenerist:
1. Cleanser: Designed to gently remove dirt and make-up leaving skin purified and prepared for the rest of your routine.
2. Serum: Designed to be lightweight so they can be layered on the skin before your traditional moisturiser. Easily absorbs and delivers anti-ageing ingredients into skin's epidermis layer.
3. Moisturiser: Designed for long-lasting hydration and offered in 3 types - Day, UV, and Night.
4. Eye/Treatments: Eye: Use after your moisturiser to hydrate the eye area and address key eye concerns.
Treatment: Specially designed with advanced ingredients/technology to treat specific skin concerns. Add these to further customise your skincare regimen.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
